links: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972, p. 811.
formula: From _Peter Bala_, Dec 04 2013: (Start)Definition: zeta(17) = sum {n >= 1} 1/n^17.zeta(17) = 2^17/(2^17 - 1)*( sum {n even} n^11*p(n)*p(1/n)/(n^2 - 1)^18 ), where p(n) = n^8 + 36*n^6 + 126*n^4 + 84*n^2 + 9. Cf. A013663, A013667 and A013671.(End)zeta(17) = Sum_{n >= 1} (A010052(n)/n^(17/2)) = Sum_{n >= 1} ( (floor(sqrt(n)) - floor(sqrt(n-1)))/n^(17/2) ). - _Mikael Aaltonen_, Feb 23 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
